Software: Intel Integrated Performance Primitives (Intel IPP) for Intel 64
AI Description: The Intel Integrated Performance Primitives (Intel IPP) is a library of functions for multimedia, data processing, and communication applications which are developed to enable developers to deliver more reliable, scalable, and efficient applications.
Core Features: Optimized Functions For Multimedia, Data Processing, & Communication Applications, Support For Various Data Types & Platforms Including Intel 64 Architecture, Parallel Processing Capabilities For Improved Performance, Integration With Popular Development Environments & Compilers
General Tags: Software Library, Multimedia Processing, Data Processing, Communication Applications
